name: buildfast-chat-backend
description: Backend server for BuildFast Chat with Stripe integration

scripts.test: node -e "require('http').get('http://localhost:3000/api/health', (r) => { let data = ''; r.on('data', (chunk) => data += chunk); r.on('end', () => console.log(data)); }).on('error', (e) => console.error('Server not running:', e.message));"
